game.name: PhantomZone labyrinthos ファントムゾーン・ラビュリントス
game.shortDescription: ”The nightmare that never allows waking lasts forever.” You wake up from bed and a girl appears before you. She calls herself “Entourfe,” a management support android. The stage is a strange facility, and you will explore the inside of the strange facility with her. ......
game.shortDescriptionEn: ”The nightmare that never allows waking lasts forever.” You wake up from bed and a girl appears before you. She calls herself “Entourfe,” a management support android. The stage is a strange facility, and you will explore the inside of the strange facility with her. ......
